ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Enrich your stats, add a list of the best customers to the dashboard.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Statistikangizni boyiting, boshqaruv paneliga eng yaxshi mijozlar ro'yxatini qo'shing.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: In order to achieve this goal, you can organize:
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Ushbu maqsadga erishish uchun siz tashkil qilishingiz mumkin:

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Keeping a client can be more profitable than gaining a new one. That is one of the many reasons it is necessary to cultivate customer loyalty.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Mijozni saqlash yangisini olishdan ko'ra ko'proq foyda keltirishi mumkin.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Punctual operations: commercial rewards (personalized special offers, product or service offered), non commercial rewards (priority handling of an order or a product), pecuniary rewards (bonds, discount coupons, payback).
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Vaqtiy operatsiyalar: tijorat mukofotlari (shaxsiylashtirilgan maxsus takliflar, mahsulot yoki xizmatni), pul yoki mahsulotning ustuvor ishlov berilishi, pul mukofoti (obligatsiyalar, chegirma kuponlar, to'lov).

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Sustainable operations: loyalty points or cards, which not only justify communication between merchant and client, but also offer advantages to clients (private offers, discounts).
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Barqaror operatsiyalar: savdogar va mijoz o'rtasidagi aloqalarni oqlaydigan, balki mijozlarga (xususiy takliflar, chegirmalar) ustunlik qilishni taklif qiladi.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: These operations encourage clients to buy products and visit your online store more regularly.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Ushbu operatsiyalar mijozlarni mahsulot sotib olishlarini va onlayn-do'koningizga muntazam ravishda tashrif buyurishni rag'batlantiradi.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Word of mouth is also a means for getting new, satisfied clients. A dissatisfied customer can hurt your e-reputation and obstruct future sales goals.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Og'izning so'zi, shuningdek, yangi, qoniqarli mijozlarni olish uchun vositadir.
